SEARCH

Package ComparativeGenomics.Panels

package ComparativeGenomics.Panels
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AlignmentsOnChromosomeChartPanel
    Plots the number of alignments found per each cmap ID of the query genome accross a chromosome from the reference genome using XChart.
    AlignmentsPerChromosomeChartPanel
     
    ChromosomeChartPanel
    Plots the number of each different type of SV event per chromosome within the reference genome using XChart.
    ChromosomePanel
    Extends javax.swing.JPanel which draws all of the XmapData objects corresponding to a chosen Chromosome.
    CircosPanel
    Draws the chromosome making up the genome in a circle.
    CompGenStart
    Provides the GUI and methods to start an alignment Job on an ExternalServer.
    CompGenView
    Panel on which alignments of two genomes using optical mapping data are displayed.
    EnzymeChartPanel
    Plots the results of calc_best_enzymes.sh script of an uploaded fasta file using XChart
    GenomePanel
    Displays all the chromosomes of the reference.
    QueryPanel
    Displays the alignments of a query for a chromosome.
